entities.name: muggle suits
entities.description: The text describes 'muggle suits' as a group of people who are dressed in formal attire and are moving forward with efficiency.

entities.name: cars
entities.description: The cars stopped, allowing the muggle suits to move forward.

entities.name: party
entities.description: The party is being escorted by the muggle suits into the station.

entities.name: station

entities.name: Mrs Weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is a member of the Weasley family and seems flustered by the efficiency of the muggle suits.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is being escorted by the Aurors into the station.

entities.name: Auror
entities.description: The Aurors are assisting in escorting Harry and the party into the station.

entities.name: Hermione

entities.name: Weasleys
